alert.note: Alert for Stark (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 2:50PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Stark County through 330 PM EDT... At 250 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Massillon, or near Canton, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Canton, Massillon, Alliance, North Canton, Louisville, Minerva, Brewster, Navarre, East Canton, Meyers Lake, Hills And Dales, Robertsville, Maximo and Perry Heights. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for northeastern Ohio.
